name: Designing for resource efficiency
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: The most effective way of reducing waste is through effective design. This includes designing for materials optimisation, utilising offsite construction and designing for deconstruction, reuse and recovery. This session covers how to put these principles into practice and includes case studies.

presentations.name: How lessons from Cheshire Oaks informed ongoing development proposals with M&S
Design for reuse - the conversion of a former supermarket into a new headquarters for Moray Council
Delivering on site
presentations.speakers: Rachel Woolliscroft, Head of Sustainability, Wates
